name: Annapurna Base Camp Trek
guide: Day 01:  Drive from Kathmandu to Pokhara,  Day 02:  Drive to Birethanti and Trek to Ulleri,  Day 03:  Trek to Ghorepani,  Day 04:  Hike to Poonhill,  Day 05:  Tadapani to Chhomrong village,  Day 06:  Chhomrong to Dovan,  Day 07:  Dovan to Deurali,  Day 08:  Trek to ABC via Machhapuchhre Base Camp,  Day 09:  Return from Annapurna Base Camp to Bamboo,  Day 10:  Bamboo to Jhinu Danda Hot Spring,  Day 11:  Return from Jhinu Danda and drive back to Pokhara,  Day 12:  Drive from Pokhara to Kathmandu
description: In Nepal's heart, where ice-covered peaks pierce the sky, lies an adventure unlike any other. Experience a delightful adventure at Annapurna Base Camp to satisfy your trek hunger and make the memory of a lifetime. This natural hiking trip to the base camp sits at more than 4000m, an entryway to the Annapurna Himalayas, where the tenth-highest peak (8091m) lies.

name: Everest Base Camp Trek
guide: Day 01:  Flight to Lukla from Kathmandu, followed by a trek to Phakding,  Day 02:  Trek to Namche Bazaar,  Day 03:  Hike to Everest View Hotel,  Day 04:  Trek to Tengboche,  Day 05:  Trek to Dingboche,  Day 06:  Acclimatization: Hike to Nangkartshang Peak,   Day 07:  Trek to Lobuche,  Day 08:  Lobuche - Gorak Shep - Everest Base Camp - Gorak Shep,  Day 09:  Hike to Kala Patthar - Gorak Shep - Pheriche,  Day 10:  Trek to Namche,  Day 11:  Trek to Lukla,   Day 12:  Return Back to Kathmandu
description: The Everest Base Camp Trek is one of Nepal's most exciting and sought-after routes in the Himalayan region. Ideally, a 16-day long EBC trek takes you to the foot of Mount Everest, the highest peak in the world at 8800 meters above sea level.

name: Ghorepani Poon Hill Trek
bestTime: April to May and September to early December
guide: Day 01:  Drive to Pokhara,  Day 02:  Drive to Nayapul and Trek to Tikhedhunga,  Day 03:  Trek to Ghorepani,  Day 04:  Trek to Tadapani,  Day 05:  Trek to Ghandruk,  Day 06:  Trek to Nayapul and drive back to Pokhara,   Day 07:  Drive back to Kathmandu
description: Ghorepani Poon Hill Trekking is one of the exemplary trekking destinations in Annapurna region of Nepal that contributes the best perceptions of Annapurna and Dhaulagiri mountain range. It is also known as Annapurna Sunrise Trekking. The spectacular mountains, beautiful ethnic villages and many other factors explains the popularity of Ghorepani Poon Hill trekking. Low but favorable elevation of Poon Hill from where you will observe the awesome sunrise and sunsets over the Himalayas in 3000m is the most significant of Ghorepani Trekking.

name: Gosaikunda Trek
guide: Day 01:  Kathmandu to Syabru Bensi,  Day 02:  Syabru Bensi to Lama Hotel,  Day 03:  Lama Hotel to Mundu,  Day 04:  Mundu to Kyanjing Gompa,  Day 05:  Kyangjuma Gompa Exploration and climb Chorkari RI,  Day 06:  Kyanjin Gompa- Lama Hotel,  Day 07:  Lama Hotel - Thulo Syabru,  Day 08:  Thulo Syabru- Shin Gompa,  Day 09:  Shin Gompa to Gosaikunda,  Day 10:  Gosaikunda to Ghopte via Laurebinayak Yak pass,  Day 11:  Ghopte to Malemchigaon,  Day 12:  Malemchigaon to Tarkeghyang,  Day 13:  Tarkeghyang to Shermathang,  Day 14:  Shermathang - Melamchi - Pul Bazaar to Kathmandu
description: The Langtang Gosaikunda Trek is a remarkable journey that takes you through the captivating Langtang Valley, the serene Gosaikunda Lake, and the picturesque Helambu Valley. This unique combination of treks provides an unforgettable circular experience, allowing you to explore the very best of the Langtang region.

name: Gokyo Lake Trek
bestTime: March to May and Sept to December
guide: Day 01:  Flight to Lukla from Kathmandu and, followed by a trek to Phakding,  Day 02:  Trek to Namche Bazaar,  Day 03:  Trek to Dole (or Khumjung),  Day 04:  Trek to Macchermo,  Day 05:  Trek to Gokyo,  Day 06:  Hike to Gokyo Ri, back to Gokyo,   Day 07:  Trek to Dole,  Day 08:  Trek to Namche Bazaar,  Day 09:  Trek to Lukla,  Day 10:  Flight from Lukla to Kathmandu
description: Gokyo valley trekking is one of the most preferable as well as most recommended trekking in Nepal to spend your good time with snowcapped mountains, breathtaking natural lakes and Ngozumpa Glacier- the largest in Nepal's Himalayas. Gokyo valley trekking which is located in Everest region gives you a glorious feeling. The significance of this place is the spectacular views of the popular mountains, at an altitude of 8000m such as Everest, Cho Oyu, Lhotse and Makalu which are visible from Gokyo Ri that is above Gokyo Lake. Another most remarkable feature is the view of the incredible ice ridge between Cho Oyu and Gyachung located in Khumbu region.

name: Helambu Trek
bestTime: March to May and Sept to December
guide: Day 01:  Kathmandu to Sundarijal and trek to Chisapani,  Day 02:  Chisapani to Kutumsang,  Day 03:  Kutumsang to Thadapati,  Day 04:  Thadapati to Melamchi gaun,  Day 05:  Melamchi gaun to Tarkeghyang,  Day 06:  Tarkeghyang to Sermathang,   Day 07:  Sermathang to Melamchi gaun,  Day 08: Melamchi to Kathmandu
description: Helambu trekking is another popular trekking trial that lies in the Langtang region. It one of the best short trek renowned for its location, radiant nature and best journey to examine the ancient and antique Tibetan culture of people residing here on the lap of Himalayas at the highest altitude of the world. Helambu trekking is located about 72 kilometers northeast of Kathmandu. It is also renowned for its scenic grandeur and pleasant climate. Helambu region which is extended from north of Taramarang to the limit of the Gosaikunda Lake and lower slopes of Jugal Himal, has numerous plateau where Tamang and Sherpa villages are scattered on both sides of the Malemchi River.

name: Island-Peak Trek
bestTime: March to May and Sept to December
guide: Day 01:  Kathmandu to Lukla and trek to Phakding,  Day 02:  Trek to Namche Bazaar,  Day 03:  Rest day in Namche Bazaar,  Day 04:  Trek to Tengboche,  Day 05:  Trek to Pheriche,  Day 06:  Trek to Lobuche,  Day 07:  Trek to Groaksheep and same day to Base Camp,  Day 08:  Trek to Dingboche,  Day 09:  Trek to Chukung,  Day 10:  Trek to Island Peak Base Camp,  Day 11:  Trek to High Camp,  Day 12:  Ascent of Island Peak,  Day 13:  Trek to pangboche,  Day 14:  Trek to Namche Bazaar,  Day 15: Trek to Lukla,  Day 16:  Flight back to Kathmandu
description: The Langtang Gosaikunda Trek is a remarkable journey that takes you through the captivating Langtang Valley, the serene Gosaikunda Lake, and the picturesque Helambu Valley. This unique combination of treks provides an unforgettable circular experience, allowing you to explore the very best of the Langtang region.

name: Jomsom-Muktinath Trek
bestTime: March to May and Sept to December
guide: Day 01:  Kathmandu to Pokhara,  Day 02:  Pokhara to Jomsom and trek to Kagbeni,  Day 03:  Kagbeni to Muktinath,  Day 04:  Trek to Marpha,  Day 05:  Trek to Tatopani,  Day 06:  Trek to Ghorepani,  Day 07:  Morning hike to Poonhill and trek to Ghandruk,  Day 08:  Trek to Birethanti and drive back to Pokhara,  Day 09:  Drive back to Kathmandu
description: Jomsom Muktinath Trek is one of the spectacular trekking spot in Northern Pokhara of the Annapurna region. It begins from beautiful city Pokhara and passes through the Valley of Kali Gandaki River to the holy and pilgrim site of Muktinath. The natural beauty along the Jomsom - Muktinath is amazing. The scenery of the trail ranges from the forests of red rhododendrons to rocky cliffs and desert of Mustang.The trekking route is the entrance gate for upper mustang. This is a most popular short trek attracting over 75% of all the trekkers.

name: Kanchenjunga Base Camp Trek
bestTime: March to May and Sept to December
guide: Day 01:  Kathmandu to Biratnagar,  Day 02:  Biratnagar - Suketar - Mitlung,  Day 03:  Mitlung - Chirwa,  Day 04:  Chirwa - Sekathum,  Day 05:  Sekathum - Amjilossa,  Day 06:  Amjilossa - Gybala,  Day 07:  Gybala - Ghunsa,  Day 08:  Ghunsa - Khambachen,  Day 09:  Rest day at Khambachen,  Day 10:  Khambachen - Lhonak,  Day 11:  Lhonak - Pangpema,  Day 12:  Lhonak - Ghunsa,  Day 13:  Ghunsa - High Camp,  Day 14:  High Camp - Mirgin La Pass - Tseram,  Day 15:  Tseram - Ramche,  Day 16:  Day trek to Oktang,  Day 17:  Ramche - Lamite Bhanjyang,  Day 18:  Lamite Bhanjyang - Yamphudin,  Day 19:  Yamphudin - Pophe,  Day 20:  Ponphe - Khunjari,  Day 21:  Khunjari - Suketar,  Day 22:  Flight from Suketar to Biratnagar and another flight to Kathmandu
description: Kanchenjunga Base Camp Trekking is the third highest peak in the world at 8586m/28,169ft and is on the border between Nepal and Sikkim (India). This one of the daring and dreamy trekking. Kanchenjunga Base Camp Trekking takes us close to the big mountains through thick forests of rhododendrons, orchids, pine, the higher valleys and the developing fields used for grazing by the gentle yak-herding Lepchas. In Tibetan, the word Kanchenjunga means ‘five great treasure houses of snow’ which indicates at the mountain sight that awaits trekkers.

name: Langtang Valley Trek
bestTime: March to May and Sept to December
guide: Day 01:  Kathmandu to Syabrubesi,  Day 02:  Syabrubesi to Lama Hotel,  Day 03:  Lama Hotel to Langtang,  Day 04:  Langtang to Kyanjin Gumba,  Day 05:  Rest day at Kyanjin ,  Day 06:  Kyanjin Gumba to Lama Hotel,  Day 07:  Lama Hotel to Syabrubesi,  Day 08:  Syabrubesi to Kathmandu
description: Langtang valley trekking is also popularly known as valley of glaciers trek. Langtang is one of the closet places from Kathmandu Valley where you could get to see huge snowcapped mountains and gorgeous glaciers. Langtang valley is located only 19 miles from Kathmandu on the north. Few hours’ of drive from Kathmandu will take you to the beautiful Langtang region.The whole valley is surrounded by Mount Langtang Lirung (7246m) that offers pine forest, rugged rock, swift mountain streams and snow-capped peaks. Though Langtang Valley trekking is very close to Kathmandu, the Langtang Region is as wild as any Tibetan highlands with peaceful rural scenery.

name: Lobuche Valley Trek
bestTime: March to May and Sept to December
guide: Day 01:  Kathmandu to Lukla and trek to Phakding,  Day 02:  Phakding to Namche bazaar,  Day 03:  acclimatization day in Namche bazaar,  Day 04:  Trekking to Tengboche,  Day 05:  Trekking to Dingboche ,  Day 06:  Trekking to Lobuche Village,  Day 07:  Trekking to Gorekshep and detour to Everest Base Camp,  Day 08:  Hike up to Kala Patthar and back to Lobuche,  Day 09:  Trek to Lobuche East Base Camp and basic climbing training,  Day 10:  Ascending to Lobuche East Peak high camp,  Day 11:  Summit day and descend back to Base camp,  Day 12:  Trek down to Tengboche,  Day 13:  Trekking back to Monjo,  Day 14:  Flight to Kathmandu
description: Raised above the Lobuche village Lobuche East Peak is 6,119 meters peak which is one of the popular trekking peaks in the Everest region. Lobuche East Peak was submitted first by Laurence Nielsson and Ang Gyalzen Sherpa on April 25, 1984.Although Lobuche East Peak is not a very technical mountain, the summit demands a good number of physical effort as it is a challenging peak, unlike another famous climbing peak, the island peak (6189M) near the region.

name: Makalu Base Camp Trek
bestTime: March to May and Sept to November
guide: Day 01:  Kathmandu to Tumlingtar and drive to Num,  Day 02:  Trek to Num and Seduwa,  Day 03:  Trek to Tashi Gaun,  Day 04:  Trek to Khongma Danda,  Day 05:  Trek to Dobate,  Day 06:  Trek to Yangle Kharka,  Day 07:  Trek to Langmale Kharka,  Day 08:  Accialization Day,  Day 09:  Langmale Kharka to Makalu Base Camp,  Day 10:  Explore Makalu Base Camp,  Day 11:  Trek back to Yangle Kharka,  Day 12:  Trek back to Dobate,  Day 13:  Dobate to Khongma Danda,  Day 14:  Khongma danda to Seduwa,  Day 15:  Trek and Drive to Tumlingtar,  Day 16:  Flight back to Kathmandu
description: Situated at an elevation of 8,463 m above sea level, Mount Makalu is the fifth-highest peak in the world, which lies in the eastern part of Nepal. Setting your foot on the trails of Makalu, which are packed with beautiful and evergreen rhododendron forests, is a once-in-a-lifetime trekking experience.    The Makalu Base Camp trekking is ideal for anyone looking to avoid the hefty crowds on the trails without compromising the adventures and exhilarating part of the trip. The Makalu base camp trek is a gateway to exploring the diverse cultures and traditions in the region.
